Package org.opengrok.indexer.util

Class UriUtils

java.lang.Object
org.opengrok.indexer.util.UriUtils
public class UriUtils extends Object
Represents a container for utility methods concerned with URIs.

  • Method Details

    • trimUri

      public static UriUtils.TrimUriResult trimUri(String uri, boolean shouldCheckEnding, Pattern collateralCapture)
      Trims a URI, specifying whether to enlist the StringUtils.countURIEndingPushback(String) algorithm or the StringUtils.countPushback(String, Pattern) or both.

      If the pushback count is equal to the length of url, then the pushback is set to zero -- in order to avoid a never-ending lexical loop.

      Parameters:
      uri - the URI string
      shouldCheckEnding - a value indicating whether to call StringUtils.countURIEndingPushback(String)
      collateralCapture - optional pattern to call with StringUtils.countPushback(String, Pattern)
      Returns:
      a defined instance
